data.text: @truecrime_lover When will ppl realise that its all about divide and rule? I just don't get ppl anymore. 🤷
@truecrime_lover @MortonMadHatter I have a couple of his books sitting unread. His current views have tarnished the ones I enjoyed previously.
@SeanMLCarroll Yep bitter and they think the virtue signalling and being in that crowd makes them superior 🙈

@truecrime_lover 🤣🤣🤣

Good point... They will be changing their profile pics like no tomorrow!! 😝

@truecrime_lover I think for the most part it's just that virtue signaling is so bloody important to them, absolutely paramount... I done believe they think about anything else when spilling out what, outside of their oh so virtuous bubbles is plain and simple hate?!! 

They're a bitter bunch!!
@MortonMadHatter Used to like his books/movies then he showed his true colours like most of them did in the last two years canâ€™t stand him now.
@truecrime_lover Is he morphin' into one of his monsters or somethin'?
